page.title: 07 ACCIDENT BLACK SPOT
page.content: In our area we have an accident black spot at the junction of the A5 and A428.On either sides there is a garage and a public house.We asked the landlord and the owner of the garage some questions.The landlord has lived at the halfway house for 2 years.The garage man has lived there since 1957.The history of the crashes goes back a long time. The worst crash was in 1964 when a lorry of live fish tipped over with fish going everywhere it killed 3 people from a family.The road lay out has been changed at least 6 times. The best change is the round about which is the one we have now.
